about_the_game:
Hup Hup and Away!

Life is sweet with Hup Hup the Cupcake! With no bills, no worries, and no end in sight, Hup Hup spends his days roaming the blissful sky, hopping across grassy lumps in a dreamlike journey above the clouds. Leap between towering platforms in search of the sacred Finish Dish. Set your own challenge as you play through batches of procedurally generated levels with a quantity and difficulty of your choosing. Treat yourself to peace of mind, knowing you can always try again if you fall, and there will always be a new level to play when you finish. Welcome to the world of Hup Hup, where fun is a piece of cake!

Have your Cake… and Cup it Too!

Choose your number of levels in increments of 10, all the way up to 1000!

Set your minimum and maximum difficulty, so you can enjoy a sweet and simple ride, a trek with rising action, or a constant chocolatey challenge!

Or, set the level count to 0 to play forever, with an infinite chain of levels of random difficulty within your chosen range!

If it Smells, Skip it!

Don’t like a level? Skip it in the pause menu to get a new one!

name: Hup Hup The Cupcake

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core m3-7Y39 CPU @ 1.00GHz, 1608 Mhz, 2 Cores, 4 Logical Processors
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compute shader support is required (Shader Model 5.0 GPU or higher)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 12th Gen Intel Core i7-12650H, 2300 Mhz, 10 Cores, 16 Logical Processors
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 6GB Laptop GPU
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 64 GB available space

short_description: High jump, long jump, and wall jump your way through an endless array of procedurally generated levels set above the clouds! Customize the length and difficulty of your journey to your liking in Hup Hup The Cupcake, the relaxing 3D precision platformer!
